name: Let's play Chess
description:
A tinny game about some chess pieces before the game begins.

I made this game with Bipsi so, thank you so much to Candle for making this program.

Also, thanks to Princess Internet Café for showing me Bipsi and for tutoring and helping me with this.

I used an Undertale song for this and also I edited some random google chess images.

This is the first time I do a thing like this, and even if it's small and have no interesting parts, I am very proud of being able to do this!
